title: Topic 001 Question 187
body: A company has multiple AWS accounts that are part of AWS Organizations. The company's Security team wants to ensure that even those Administrators with full access to the company's AWS accounts are unable to access the company's Amazon S3 buckets.
options: Add a permissions boundary to deny access to Amazon S3 and attach it to all roles.
Create a VPC endpoint for Amazon S3 and deny statements for access to Amazon S3.
